rules.text: By signing up and using the service at opalstack.social you are agreeing to the terms of service outlined in the privacy policy.
Follow all laws of the United States.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No false or misleading information that may lead to physical harm.

No behavior perceived as SPAM will be tolerated. If we see this behavior we will ban your account. See 'About' page for details. SPAM is mindless posting of links to your content. Do your due diligence before attempting to market here. ActivityPub is about human interaction.
Prohibition of Gambling and Betting Activities
English language only. Our admin team's primary language is English. That is the language we are trained and qualified to support.

All brands need a real human representative to have an account and be human verifiable. Provide your social media links and anything our admin team needs to validate you as 'real human'. Once you have been verified PM the admin to request access for your brand. No exceptions.
